name: Brothers Of Duel
description:
Brothers of Duel is a turn by turn arcade game where two player can play. Each of you will have to firstly choose where move and shoot, after that we'll see who shot the other !

 

This game is made in 2 weeks by students from IIM School.  

      

Students:

- Paul Gaffney

- Simeon Malaret

- Adrien Jen

- Loïc Lanternier

- Lucas Sanchez

- Quentin Chailleux

Download it on the Google Play store!
